${modID}:ReelIn.NAME: Reel In
${modID}:ReelIn.DESCRIPTION: Put a random fishing:Fish from your draw pile into your hand and Upgrade it. NL fishing:Delve.
${modID}:ReelIn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put 2 random fishing:Fish from your draw pile into your hand and Upgrade them. NL fishing:Delve.

${modID}:SkiLift.NAME: Ski Lift
${modID}:SkiLift.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Put !M! random cards your discard pile into your hand.

${modID}:Aluminum.NAME: Aluminum
${modID}:Aluminum.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! *Plated *Armor. NL Play ALL fishing:Foil cards in your hand.

${modID}:TheyAteMyFish.NAME: They Ate My Fish
${modID}:TheyAteMyFish.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target is depicted in this card's art, gain !M! *Enrage. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Cocoon.NAME: Cocoon
${modID}:Cocoon.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Convert your *Plated *Armor to *Metallicize. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Mitosis.NAME: Mitosis
${modID}:Mitosis.DESCRIPTION: Copy a random Colorless card in your hand. NL fishing:Picked: Copy one from your deck.
${modID}:Mitosis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Copy a random Colorless card in your hand twice. NL fishing:Picked: Copy one from your deck twice.

${modID}:DullScissors.NAME: Dull Scissors
${modID}:DullScissors.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice. 2x damage to Weak foes. NL fishing:Picked: Upgrade a fishing:Foil card.
${modID}:DullScissors.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice. 3x damage to Weak foes. NL fishing:Picked: Upgrade a fishing:Foil card.
